kick.Description:: Kicks a user out of the server.

ban.Description:: Bans a user from the server.

permamute.Description:: Permanently mute a user until manually unmuted.

unmute.Description:: Unmute a user that is muted.

mute.Description:: Mute a user for a specified amount of time.

pfp.Description:: Pull up the profile picture of yourself or another user

profile.Description:: Look up your own profile or another's profile.

warn.Description:: Warn a user for breaking rules.

prefix.Description:: Change the prefix of the bot for your server.

purge.Description:: Delete a mass amount of messages

remindme.Description:: Set a dm reminder (or in channel of command if dms are off)

setlogs.Description:: Set a channel to a certin catigory for audit logs
setlogs.Usage:: setlogs <#channel> [general, moderation, voice, member, message, server]

bean.Description:: Bean a user to bean them!

eightball.Description:: Ask the all mighty 8 ball a yes or no question!

lock.Description:: Prevent anyone from typing in a channel

embed.Description:: Create an embed message with a title, description, and a thumbnail!
embed.Usage:: embed ['Title']['Description']['Thumbnail URL'] (single quotes need to be double quotes)

warnlist.Description:: Look at the warns of a user.

pardonwarn.Description:: Remove a warning from a member. Warning is the warning you see in the command d!warnlist, the numbers go up to down (the top warning is the 1st warning).

slowmode.Description:: Set the slowmode of a channel
